Module dunbar.c482pa
Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

Class MainWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c482pa.Controllers.MainWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The main window controller provides methods for loading and controlling the main window of the Inventory application GUI. This includes loading and populating the parts and products tables, implementing a search function for both tables, implementing a delete function for both tables, navigating to the Add and Modify Part and Product windows, and exiting the application. Implements the initialize method of the Initializable interface to load GUI elements on startup.

    • onActionDeletePart

      void onActionDeletePart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws NullPointerException
      Deletes a part from the Part table when a part is selected and the Delete button is pressed. Done by invoking the Inventory deletePart() method.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Delete button
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Delete button
      Throws:
      NullPointerException

    • onActionPartSearch

      void onActionPartSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws NumberFormatException
      Implements search and filtering functionality for the part table. Every time a key is pressed in the part search text box, runs the appropriate Inventory lookupPart() method based on the type of input (integer vs string) then filters the part table contents accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by typing in the part search text box
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException

    • onActionProductSearch

      void onActionProductSearch(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event) throws NumberFormatException
      Implements search and filtering functionality for the product table. Every time a key is pressed in the product search text box, runs the appropriate Inventory lookupProduct() method based on the type of input (integer vs string) then filters the part table contents accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by typing in the product search text box
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException
